item.title: DOGE staffer who shared Treasury data now has more access to government systems
item.description: New court filings give more details about a small number of DOGE staffers granted sweeping access to sensitive government data systems.

item.title: The head of Africa CDC thought news of a U.S. aid freeze must be 'a joke.' Now what?
item.description: Dr. Jean Kaseya is now figuring out how to cope with the new foreign aid landscape.
